messages.NewWorld.Title: Новы свет
messages.FullBody.Title: Full Body Calibration
messages.FullBody.HeightInstructions: Make sure this is your actual height, otherwise calibration won't work correctly. The mannequin should fit the headset and controllers.
messages.FullBody.HeightWarning: Гэта здаецца няправільным. Пераканайцеся, што гэта фактычная вышыня.
messages.FullBody.MappingInstructions: Stand in upright position and ensure the trackers are tracking and detected correctly.
messages.FullBody.JustCalibrateAvatarDescription: Skip full body calibration and just calibrate the avatar
messages.FullBody.CalibrateInstructions: Align yourself with the the red body overlay in your playspace and press both triggers to confirm. Make sure your real feet and hips match the virtual ones as close as possible.
messages.FullBody.BeforeCalibrationInstructions: Пераканайцеся, што трэкеры адсочваюць і ваш рост усталяваны
messages.FullBody.CalibratingPoseInstructions: Align yourself with the reference and press both triggers to confirm
messages.FullBody.AdjustAvatarInstructions: Adjust avatar body offsets to best match the reference
messages.FullBody.FineTuneCalibrationInstructions: Праверце і адкарэктуйце каліброўку, перамяшчаючы сінія спасылкі
messages.FullBody.CalibrateTrackersInstructions:
Grab and position the blue body parts relative to the trackers to adjust their offset. They should match the location of the tracker on your body.
You can adjust calibration anytime later by reopening this tool.
messages.FullBody.HeightCompensationInstructions: If the mannequin is too tall (hunched) or too short, adjust the height compensation for best fit.
messages.FullBody.CalibrateAvatarInstructions: Make sure all body parts are mapped and then drag the blue spheres around, to make the avatar best match the body reference.
messages.FullBody.AvatarHeightCompensationInstruc: If the avatar is too tall (ends up hunched up) or too short for you adjust its height compensation here so it better fits your height.
messages.FullBody.AvatarSaveWarning: Не забудзьцеся захаваць свой аватар пасля таго, як скончыце яго каліброўку!
messages.FullBody.CalibrationFinishedInstructions: If you're satisfied with the calibration, you can save your avatar now and exit.
messages.FullBody.CalibrationRedoInstructions:
If the calibration is off or you want to calibrate more avatars you can make more adjustments. You can also reopen this calibrator any time in the future to make adjusments.
If you've only changed your trackers, you don't need to calibrate your avatars again.

messages.CameraControl.Anchors.NoAnchors: No camera anchors in this world
messages.CameraControl.OBS.Instructions: Make sure that OBS is running and has the obs-websocket plugin installed
messages.CameraControl.OBS.ConnectionTimeout: Connection timeout. Is OBS running with websocket plugin installed?
messages.Settings.LegacyGripEquip: Уключыць экіпіроўку са старым двайным счапленнем
messages.Security.Hyperlink.Warning: Папярэджанне: гіперспасылка на выхадзе Вы націснулі спасылку ў свеце. Вы хочаце адкрыць яго? Гэта адкрыецца ў вэб-аглядальніку вашага працоўнага стала.
messages.Security.HostAccess.Title: Доступ да гаспадара
messages.Security.HostAccess.Warning: Папярэджанне: World спрабуе атрымаць доступ да старонняга хоста Дазвол доступу можа дазволіць трэцяй баку збіраць некаторую асабістую інфармацыю, напрыклад, ваш IP і геаграфічнае месцазнаходжанне.
